title: Brady vs. Lamar, The Nontrade Deadline, Dalton’s Benching, and the Art of the Tank | The Ringer NFL Show
description:
Teams were incredibly quiet at this year's trade deadline. We talk about why this was a mistake for the Bengals and the other tankers. Then, a Take Shop on the best NFL brothers of all time and the AFC South’s potential playoff teams (2:00) before we get into the biggest three games of the week, break down the 49ers' offensive scheme, and defend the Jets (29:20).
Hosts: Robert Mays and Kevin Clark

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
